MonsterTrait.Name: Siege Monster
MonsterTrait.Text: The treant deals double damage to objects and structures.

MonsterTrait.Name: Treespeech
MonsterTrait.Text: A weeping treant can converse with plants, and most plants greet them with a friendly or helpful attitude.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The treant makes three slam attacks.
